scripts.docker:build: node -e "const s=require('./package.json').name; const u=process.env.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME; const tag=process.env.TAG; const env=process.env.ENV_ALIAS; require('child_process').execSync(`docker build -t ${u}/${s}:${tag} -t ${u}/${s}:${env} .`,{stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.docker:push: node -e "const s=require('./package.json').name; const u=process.env.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME; const tag=process.env.TAG; const env=process.env.ENV_ALIAS; require('child_process').execSync(`docker push ${u}/${s}:${tag} && docker push ${u}/${s}:${env}`,{stdio:'inherit'})"
